398: At PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL), we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy. Our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone, regardless of background or economic standing, has access to affordable, convenient, and secure products and services to take control of their financial lives. Job Description Summary: We are looking for a Product Manager to join the Issuance Platform team at PayPal. Our platform delivers card issuing and payment capabilities, enabling PayPal and Venmo to be used at point-of-sale and with third-party payment solutions. Your role as a member of the Issuance team will involve identifying and delivering new platform capabilities, while also enhancing our existing capabilities to continually add value to our clients' card programs. Job Description: Your day-to-day Drive new features and capabilities to ensure constant improvement and evolution of the platform to provide value to supported products. Continually monitor platform and product performance to identify potential platform improvements. Write user stories, prioritize product backlogs, and work closely with engineers in an agile development environment. Contribute to the platform roadmap and work with cross-functional teams (business, project management, product, development, analytics, and more) to execute on the roadmap. Build trust and effective relationships with peers, stakeholders, and the development team. Develop a strong understanding of the platform and card issuing business. What you need to bring A BS/BA is required; MBA or MS is a plus. Prior related professional experience or strong technical aptitude. An understanding of the software development lifecycle and agile development processes. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.
